techs.name: Pottery
techs.quote: 'No man ever wetted clay and left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune.' - Plutarch

techs.name: Animal Husbandry
techs.quote: 'I am fond of pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.' - Winston S. Churchill

techs.name: Mining
techs.quote: 'Who deserves more credit than the wife of a coal miner?' - Merle Travis

techs.name: Sailing
techs.quote: 'It is not that life ashore is distasteful to me. But life at sea is better.' - Sir Francis Drake

techs.name: Astrology
techs.quote: 'A physician without a knowledge of astrology has no right to call himself a physician.' - Hippocrates

techs.name: Irrigation
techs.quote: 'The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror' - Sir John Thomson

techs.name: Writing
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to science
techs.quote: 'The man who has grit enough to bring about the afforestation or the irrigation of a country is not less worthy of honor than its conqueror' - Paulo Coelho

techs.name: Archery
techs.quote: 'May the forces of evil become confused while your arrow is on its way to the target.' - George Carlin

techs.name: Masonry
techs.quote: 'Each of us is carving a stone, erecting a column, or cutting a piece of stained glass in the construction of something much bigger than ourselves.' - Adrienne Clarkson

techs.name: Bronze Working
techs.quote: 'I'm also interested in creating a lasting legacy ... because bronze will last for thousands of years.' - Richard MacDonald

techs.name: Wheel
techs.quote: 'Don't reinvent the wheel, just realign it.' - Anthony D'Angelo

techs.name: Celestial Navigation
techs.quote: 'Set your course by the stars, not by the lights of every passing ship' - Omar Bradley

techs.name: Currency
uniques: Enables conversion of city production to gold
techs.quote: 'Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.' - Epictetus

techs.name: Horseback Riding
techs.quote: 'A man on a horse is spiritually as well as physically bigger than a man on foot.' - John Steinfield

techs.name: Iron Working
techs.quote: 'The Lord made us all out of iron. Then he turns up the heat to forge some of us into steel.' - Marie Osmond

techs.name: Engineering
techs.quote: 'One man's 'magic' is another man's engineering.' - Robert Heinlein

techs.name: Shipbuilding
techs.quote: 'I cannot imagine any condition which would cause a ship to founder â€¦ Modern shipbuilding has gone beyond that.' - Capt. E.J. Smith, RMS Titanic

techs.name: Mathematics
techs.quote: 'If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.' - Galileo Galilei

techs.name: Construction
techs.quote: 'The four building blocks of the universe are fire, water, gravel and vinyl.' - Dave Barry

techs.name: Buttress
techs.quote: 'Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out.' - Revelation 3:12

techs.name: Military Tactics
techs.quote: 'Strategy requires thought; tactics require observation.' - Max Euwe

techs.name: Apprenticeship
techs.quote: 'We are all apprentices in a craft where no one ever becomes a master.' - Malory

techs.name: Stirrups
techs.quote: 'Betwixt the stirrup and the ground, Mercy I asked, mercy I found.' - William Camden

techs.name: Machinery
techs.quote: 'The press is the best instrument for enlightening the mind of man, and improving him as a rational, moral and social being.' - Thomas Jefferson

techs.name: Education
techs.quote: 'The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.' - Malcolm Forbes

techs.name: Military Engineering
techs.quote: 'Blast - Build - Battle' - Motto of the U.S. 16th Engineer Brigade

techs.name: Castles
techs.quote: 'If you see a castle under fog, you must walk there to meet the extraordinary dreams.' - Mehmet Murat Ildan

techs.name: Cartography
uniques: Enables [Embarked] units to enter ocean tiles
techs.quote: 'If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a cartographer.' - John Quincy Adams

techs.name: Future Tech
uniques: Who knows what the future holds?
techs.quote: 'There is nothing like a dream to create the future' - Victor Hugo
